title: Code Hover
description: LSP Hover over the code tooltip settings.

modifierKey.title: Modifier key
modifierKey.description: Keyboard key which activates the tooltip on hover.

debouncerDelay.title: Debouncer delay
debouncerDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to delay sending out the request hover request to the language server; you can get better responsiveness adjusting this value, but setting it to zero can actually slow it down as the server might get overwhelmed when moving the mose over the code.
